original_text: Or do you suppose it is to no purpose that the Scripture says, “He yearns jealously over the spirit that he has made to dwell in us”?
korean_text: 너희는 하나님이 우리 속에 거하게 하신 성령이 시기하기까지 사모한다 하신 말씀을 헛된 줄로 생각하느냐

sentences.original_text: Or do you suppose it is to no purpose
He yearns jealously over the spirit
that he has made to dwell in us”?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리 안에 거하게 하신 것이라고?”
